'Home Box Office' ('HBO') is an American premium cable and satellite television
network that is owned by Time Warner, under the operating subsidiary Home Box
Office Inc. HBO's programming consists primarily of theatrically released
motion pictures and original television series, along with made-for-cable
movies and documentaries, boxing matches and occasional stand-up comedy and
concert specials.
categories: Cable television in the United States
Companies based in New York City
Television channels and stations established in 1972
